name: Piano White Master
description:
It's the wonderful piano music game! Piano White Master.
There are two kinds of tiles for you: white and black.
Black: you need to click all of black tiles.
White: For your suggestion, please don't step the white tiles!

The popular Piano White Master - Don't touch the white tile, with high quality, lot's of modes and Plenty of piano songs in our game!

Now we have 20 songs in the game:
- Castle in the Sky
- For Elise
- Little Star
- Turkish March
- Butterfly Love
- Final Fantasy
- Cannon
- Let it go
- Castle in the sky
- Summer
- The Dawn
- Right Here Waiting
- Mariage D' amour
- etc.

Watch your step, don't step any white tiles. This is the core rule in this additive game.

The game is easy and fun, just have a try!

There are about 20 addictive modes, each mode has different levels:
1) Classic mode, get dark tiles as soon as possible or try the pro mode
2) Arcade mode, try your best to tap the dark tiles as many as you can, and do not miss one.
3) Zen mode, try your best to tap the black tiles as many as you can in certain seconds.
4) Catch mode, try to catch more and more tiles
5) Up&Down mode, the speed will change, watch out
6) Side mode, piano white will be in from side
7) Turning Mode, direction will change during the game
8) Catch Me mode, the tile will change it's position, you need to catch it
9) Tiles of Piano Candle Model
10) Tiles of Piano Blizzard Model
11) Tiles of Piano Earth Quake Model
12) Lighting Model
13) Halloween Model
14) Dash up model
15) Shoot moon model - Funny Style model
16) Cat model
17) Running Model
etc.

Keep in mind: Don't touch any white tile!

Let us know if you have any suggestion to this game, and we will implement your ideas to this game!
